mapper.insert: insert into tb_shop(owner_id, area_id, shop_category_id, shop_id, shop_name, shop_desc, shop_addr, phone, shop_img, priority, enable_status, create_time, last_edit_time, advice) VALUES (#{owner.userId}, #{area.areaId}, #{shopCategory.shopCategoryId}, #{shopId}, #{shopName}, #{shopDesc}, #{shopAddr}, #{phone}, #{shopImg}, #{priority}, #{enableStatus}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{advice})
